long_description: This BOB B-Safe Car Seat accessory base works great for 2-car families, letting you move your B-Safe seat between vehicles without having to re-secure the base each time. Premium connectors and self-guiding design make it quick and easy to install and remove the car seat from the base. Adjustable base design has 5 positions for optimal positioning; level indicators simplify the process of setting the proper angle of recline. BOB B-Safe Car Seat accessory base works with the BOB B-Safe Car Seat (sold separately).
short_description: This BOB B-Safe Car Seat accessory base works great for 2-car families, letting you move your B-Safe seat between vehicles without having to re-secure the base each time.
